Classic Mode: 

 	- Goal: Cover the highest percentage of the screen possible.
 	- Press and hold the screen to grow circles that fill the screen.
 	- If a growing circle is hit with a yellow ball, the game ends.
 	- Release your finger to stop growing the circle.
 	- Yellow balls will bounce off the circles that are not growing.

 Infinite Mode: 

 	- Goal: Score points and advance levels by filling the screen until you reach the goal mark.
 	- Reach the Goal mark to advance to the next level.

 Survival Mode: 

 	- Goal: Cover the highest percentage of the screen possible.
 	- Your circles will disappear when hit a certain number of times with the yellow balls.
 	- If your circles disappear, your percentage goes down.
 	- The highest score you achieved in the round is the recorded score.
 	- The red line indicates your highest score during that round.
 	- Larger balls live longer.

 Dynamic Mode: 

 	- Goal: Cover the highest percentage of the screen possible.
 	- Your circles move and the yellow balls are unpredictable. Can you handle it?
